meanings.definition: A sign or piece of information that suggests something
meanings.sent1: Her smile was an indication of her happiness.
meanings.sent2: The dark clouds were an indication of an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring was an indication that it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: The sudden drop in temperature was an indication that winter was coming.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's raised eyebrow was a clear indication that the students needed to be quiet.

meanings.definition: The action of pointing out or pointing to something
meanings.sent1: His indication towards the map helped us find the right direction.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide's indication of the historical monument was very informative.
meanings.sent3: The indication of the emergency exit made everyone giggle during the safety drill.
meanings.sent4: Her indication towards the beautiful sunset made me stop and admire the view.
meanings.sent5: The coach's indication to the player to switch positions was swift and effective.
